id.description: The unique identifier of the list.

createdAt.description: The date and time this list was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time this list was last updated.

description.description: A brief description of the list.

programName.description: The name of the program associated with this list.

workspaceName.description: The name of the workspace to which this list belongs.

workspaceId.description: The unique identifier of the workspace to which this list belongs.
